comment.body:
Hello @akira-miyazato! Thanks for opening this PR. 



* In the file [`dbaas/logical/views.py`](https://github.com/globocom/database-as-a-service/blob/a375af33a21e596605ec102cc4bf143a41201fb1/dbaas/logical/views.py):

> [Line 2498:1](https://github.com/globocom/database-as-a-service/blob/a375af33a21e596605ec102cc4bf143a41201fb1/dbaas/logical/views.py#L2498): [W391](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W391) blank line at end of file

Do see the [Hitchhiker's guide to code style](https://goo.gl/hqbW4r)

issue.title: Happysnake
issue.body:
## This solution refers to which of the apps?

A2 - Snake Pro

## What did you do to mitigate the vulnerability?

Used the lib bcrypt to hash the password and changed the http to https with echo lib, using TLS and generate certificate + priv key in .pem extension

## Did you test your changes? What commands did you run?
Yes, using the same commands of readme.md said:
- brew install tcpdump
- sudo tcpdump -i lo0 -X host localhost | grep -C 2 pass --color

comment.body:
This pull request **fixes 3 alerts** when merging 956758a91fcc94f91a31bcd0e8f8d87761fb758b into 6e036c0860098d7b705ef56eb3a944e94471ef77 - [view on LGTM.com](https://lgtm.com/projects/g/globocom/secDevLabs/rev/pr-a5b8c6368221ab4cd55db6e184052a33dfaf3cf7)

**fixed alerts:**

* 3 for Database query built from user\-controlled sources

pull_request.title: feat: create make compose-down script
pull_request.body:
Create a script in `Makefile` to help users take down your applications.

Now you can install your application and remove it before usage:
```bash
$ make install
SecDevLabs: 👀  Your app is starting!
SecDevLabs: 👀  Your app is still starting... (----*---)
SecDevLabs: 🔥  AX - XX is now running at http://localhost:X
...
$ make compose-down
```

issue.title: Improvements
issue.body:
- [ ] Add docker-compose down command in Makefile
- [ ] Verify another way to prune containers from docker-compose to avoid excluding no related local containers.
- [ ] Fix typo in deployments files(wrong owasp numeration)
- [ ] ? Update health check script to avoid problems with tls.
...
